headline: Beyond Nvidia: Analyst shares 3 other chip stock picks
summary: Semiconductors are driving the future of tech, but which companies are worth watching other than Nvidia (NVDA)? Ali Mogharabi, senior equity analyst at WestEnd Capital Management, discusses his top chip stock picks, including AMD (AMD), Broadcom (AVGO), and ASML (ASML). Keep watching Yahoo Finance on Wednesday, Aug. 27 for more special coverage of Nvidia's second quarter results, followed by an exclusive interview with Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang at 6:40 p.m. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: Chip stocks fall with Nvidia after data center rev disappointment
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of major semiconductor firms fell Wednesday after-hours when Nvidia Corp.’s closely watched quarterly results failed to fully satisfy lofty investor expectations, igniting concerns across the high-flying AI chip sector. Despite earnings topping Wall Street estimates, a slight shortfall in data center revenue weighed on sentiment.

headline: Chip Makers Fall With Nvidia Shares

headline: Nvidia (NVDA): Valuation Insights Following New AI Product Launches and Major Enterprise Partnerships
summary: No matter how many times you have watched the market, days like this still get your attention. Nvidia (NVDA) heads into its quarterly earnings this week riding a groundswell of excitement, but it is not just about a single report. Between headline-grabbing product launches like Jetson AGX Thor and Blackwell Ultra, and a rush of enterprise clients, including Disney, SAP, and TSMC, Nvidia is hitting the news cycle again and again. Now, with major alliances such as Broadcom and VMware and new...
